lender.name: Hamish
lender.loan_because: I want to help entrepreneurs like those on Kiva and feel loans are the best way to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I am student at ASL and you could say my school life is very vigorous.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: I can. You can too!
lender.occupational_info: I design and build robotic systems.

lender.name: Wyatt Neely
lender.loan_because: I have the ability to help others in need.

lender.name: megatonlove
lender.loan_because: What goes around comes around.

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: I can spare the cash.

lender.name: Bryan
lender.loan_because: I believe helping people to help themselves is a great philosophy.
lender.occupational_info: I help ensure employees follow the rules for accounting and compliance

lender.name: janet
lender.loan_because: I was inspired by The Nobelity Project's film "One Peace at a Time" .....each of us can give back, pay forward and contribute in so many ways.....answering the question "...but what can one person do?"

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to afford to give to people. So why not? Helping a family or a business just gives you a warm feeling, and that is the true Christmas gift for me.
lender.occupational_info: Whenever I can, I raise money to give to charity. This website (Kiva.com) is great because it allows me to donate micro-loans of $25 or $50 on a frequent basis. I hope to continue to donate money to the less fortunate, and as long as I am able to, I will try to help people.

lender.name: Jacob
lender.occupational_info: I provide Technical Support to businesses.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Christian compassion, Socialist leanings, Taught in Kenya for 7 years and am grateful to the Kenyans I taught for their friendship.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.occupation: PT Tech/ Personal Trainer/ Snowboard Instructor

lender.name: Shanan
lender.loan_because: I'm thankful that I can... and I'm inspired by women entrepreneurs who want to support their family and strengthen their community.

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone should share even a little bit of what they have with those who do not have as much.

lender.name: Gordon
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do and people need a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the oil industry. This has given myself and my family the opportunity to live in different countries and see how the world is.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I want to give back to the world what it has given me.
lender.occupational_info: Shemmy

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I have so much opportunity and I want others to have the same.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student at Yale University in Connecticut.

lender.name: Piet
lender.loan_because: I am blessed. I hope to be a blessing to others!
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses become more effective using custom built software. Computronix builds custom permitting, licencing and inspections software. We focus primarily in Land Management and Environmental Sector. We also work with a number of Charitable organizations as well. Join Computronix by contacting http://www.computronix.com. Tell them Peter sent you!.

lender.name: Luis
lender.loan_because: With this loans i really help people.
lender.occupational_info: IT on a big bank? There's not much to tell!

lender.name: Lu MK
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I run a small business - we do medical massages and other types of therapy to help people who are in pain.

lender.name: Kellie-NWCC
lender.loan_because: I did the loan versus buying Christmas gifts for my work mates.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a rural health clinic on an island.

lender.name: Mike, Holly, & Carter
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people who have the entrepreneurial spirit and drive to grow their businesses or make a difference in their communities. Sounds pretty formal, but basically, I just care about people.
lender.occupational_info: I help develop new technology solutions to prevent fraud in financial services organizations

lender.name: Philippe
lender.loan_because: it is a good way to help people who are willing and ready to take responsibility for their lives in their own hands.
lender.occupational_info: Managing an oil and gas company in Africa

lender.name: Omar
lender.loan_because: I want to know that my donations are making a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I oversee commercial construction projects

lender.name: HarpSkunk
lender.loan_because: If you want to keep it - give it away, be it time or knowledge or money.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: As someone who has been self-employed for 15 years, I know how hard it is to make a living. I want to help someone else who has a dream build the independence that I have so tenuously managed to build for myself.
lender.occupational_info: I am a playwright, screenwriter, and freelance writer. I also do some private teaching.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: It feels good
lender.occupational_info: Working years have passed. Now retired.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I work on promoting and protecting the rights of patients

lender.name: ann
lender.loan_because: My friend Kurt told me about this website and gave me a gift to loan to another. I loan because I want to be more connected to people around the world and learn about their businesses. I want to serve as a good example to my daughter.
lender.occupational_info: I write briefs to be filed in federal court in the United States.

lender.name: Morgan
lender.loan_because: I am very thankful to have a healthy child, a job, and a wonderful husband. There was a time when I struggled but I made it through the tough times with the help of a loan. We have repaid that loan and now can offer the same assistance to other people.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the computer systems at a medical school.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: I can!!

lender.name: olle
lender.occupational_info: Biology reasearch

lender.name: TRUE WEALTH NATION
lender.loan_because: We want to provide a vehicle for those who want to have a better life for themselves, their families, their communities, and ultimately, the world.
lender.occupational_info: Applying the concept of entrepreneuerial teamwork to generate financial resources that can be used as a vehicle to help people have a better life.

lender.name: Ritva
lender.loan_because: This is a way to fulfill their dreams of self-sufficiency

lender.name: So Yeon
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Patti
lender.loan_because: I want life to be better for everyone, not just a select few. I give KIVA loans as gifts because my relatives and I have more than we need.
lender.occupational_info:
I showcase Canada's underwater life to inspire people to respect the oceans. My job is to care for the animals and plants in the exhibit ; keep the machinery running and ensure good water quality.
I volunteer conserving Burrowing Owls here in Canada as well.
I LOVE THE NATURAL WORLD!!

lender.name: Vincent
lender.loan_because: I can, and I should.

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Fred
lender.loan_because: I love this planet and want it to rotate forever.
lender.occupational_info: I am a real estate agent in the San Francisco Bay Area. I spend my time working with families finding homes and selling homes

lender.name: Philippe
lender.loan_because: I belive this is the best form of international aid.
lender.occupational_info: I study intertational relations at bachelor level.

lender.name: Jody (and Bill)
lender.loan_because: Our son gave me part of this Kiva loan for a Christmas present. I love it. It is such fun to be part of someone's ambition and help make a positive difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an art museum, helping children and adults learn about the art works they are seeing.

lender.name: Alyxx
lender.loan_because: I believe we are all connected - spiritually, physically, and, of course, economically. When one grows, we all do.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people fighting deadly levels of drug and alcohol addiction, and work to help them make choices to stay safe and work towards recovery.

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to improve their lives
lender.occupational_info: office work

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: I want to see others prosper.
lender.occupational_info: I am loaning with my co-workers in mind this holiday season...Tony, Liz, Chris, Andy, Tammy, Catherine, Monica, Melissa, David, Britt, John, Marko, Shannon, Kelly, Lori, Jen, Cindy, Beni, Koeli, Marnie, Jake, Evan, Jennie, Heather, Simone and all!

lender.name: Robin, Isabelle & Allie
lender.loan_because: I want to share my blessings and empower women. I also want to teach my children the power of helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher and a writer, a mother and someone who wants to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to succeed.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I live, i love and i believe in the resourcefulness of people around the world to come together....

lender.name: The Gomal Group
lender.loan_because: We believe all people can learn to help themselves and build self-belief. We know you can do this.

lender.name: Gabrielle
lender.occupational_info: Full time College Student

lender.name: April
lender.loan_because: I love. I know that we can all make a difference in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of children. Children are the world's greatest resource! Being around children is like touching the future!

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: they need it now more than I do.

lender.name: sarah
lender.loan_because: It makes the world a better place when people are making an honest living and taking care of their families.
lender.occupational_info: My job requires patience and understanding.

lender.name: Kennabah
lender.loan_because: other people need money more than I do.
lender.occupational_info: I work with small children and help them develop necessary skills to help in their development.

lender.name: Hart
lender.loan_because: all ships should rise with the tide.
lender.occupational_info: I work with dialysis clinics.

lender.name: Spicer Family
lender.loan_because: It is such an easy way to make a difference.

lender.name: Colin & June
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance in life
lender.occupational_info: manager and teacher.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I want to give back as I was and am fortunate to have been brought up in Canada. It is time in my life to give back. I also want my two neices to learn that life outside of Canada is not easy and they need to give back as well
lender.occupational_info: I am a Physiotherapist. I help people who are sick or injured to be able to function again and live as full a life as they can

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by people with the entrepreneurial spirit. Providing them some means to power their drive is truly an inspiration
lender.occupational_info: I partner with executives at large companies to enable achievement of company strategy; with a particular focus on the company's largest resource: the employee.

lender.name: Stacey
lender.loan_because: it's a good investment in the world's future.
lender.occupational_info: I work with the suppliers my company purchases materials from in order to ensure we receive materials of good quality. When we have quality issues, I work with the suppliers to find the cause of the issue and correct it. My company manufactures products that improve the health of our customers and through my job I am able to help deliver high quality products to our customers.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I've received so much that I like to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I am a worry doctor. :-)

lender.name: Simon Thompson
lender.loan_because: I have always supported entrepreneurialism, and since loaning is a relatively risk-free activity, I feel compelled to help out honest and hardworking businesspersons.
lender.occupational_info: I am an undergraduate student at Harvard, where I study Government and Sociology. I am deeply involved in politics and public service, and my work in my community is rooted in helping those who are less fortunate and those whose voice is too often ignored. After graduation from college I plan to teach in a public school then attend law school.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I like helping people. What may seem like a small amount to us can reap huge rewards to others around the world. I would probably just spend it on junk food.
lender.occupational_info: I oversee the night operations of a community bank. We process the days' transactions, print statements, sort notices, perform system maintenance, and many other tasks that relate to the IT and banking industry.

lender.name: Avery & Theresa
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference in people's lives... even a small difference. We also understand needing help... we have a severely autistic son & Theresa has been diagnosed with a brain tumor. We have learned the hard way what is most important to us and to our family.
lender.occupational_info: Avery is a graphic designer & multimedia specialist. He has worked on on large accounts for some of the largest companies in the world... designing for Blockbuster Video, Wal-Mart, Exxon Mobile. He currently creates touch-screen video's for marketing. You'll find in many stores across the country. Theresa worked for a large computer corporation but now stays home with our 3 kids being a team mom, room mom & volunteering with the PTO at our kid's schools.

lender.name: Verity
lender.loan_because:
I am an idealist. I think the developed world has a duty to help the developing world.. above all the mothers of the next generation.
I believe the best way to help someone is to help them help themselves.
I don't like big charities
I don't like passive donations.. or guilt giving.
lender.occupational_info: Photographer

lender.name: Patricia
lender.occupation: Artist, Art for Healing and Change

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: Because every loan helps realize a dream and even little loans make a difference
lender.occupational_info: helping organizations manage their working capital and cashflows through my affiliation with Bennecon Ltd. in Canada
